Reviews.Title: “good value in a convenient location!”
Reviews.Author: c3j7s
Reviews.Content: hesitant book hotel reading reviews couldnt resist wotif price 120 surry hills perfect size decor fantastic love surry hills bit snob comes hotels wouldnt reccommend theres silver service casual thats actually liked facing crown street noise traffic wasnt pleasant blinds dont sun youre jetlagged desperate undisturbed sleep bring earplugs liked grab drink downstairs bar bottle shops closed trendy casual spacious modern surry hills cant complain 120 bargain
